comments.text: 2:25 sir textbook reading kora time o to dite hoye ar upor theke aro 3 te subject ar 2 to languages ache oi gulo o to porte hobe....4 months e eto gulo syllabus ki kore complete hobe eito bolun?? Ar upor theke project o to complete kore submit korte hoto....ar study kora jono taka lage oi ta o to income korte hobe jara financially weak ache ba parents eito income kore na tader ke to neije part- time income kore study korte hoye je aapni bolchen amar group e ba uno teachers der kache porche coaching trader ke o to tuition fee dite hoye....ba school e admission fee, registration fees, books, notebooks buy kora expense eita o to chai eita ami jara financially week ache tader kotha bolam ami....jader parents sob kichu provide korche tader view of point theke oi same problems face korche students ra ki time deba hoye nei amader ke....jarno amader Syllabus complete hoye nei....tarno ei to ar keu parents chayena ki wb board (govt schools) e students der ke admission kori jara afford korte parana tara o ektu costo kore nijer bacha ke private school e admission korchen ki amar bacha ektu bhalo school e porbe jobe o boro hobe tobe o guilt feel korbe na ki amar maa ar baba amake ektu bhalo school keno poraye nei....jobe o ekta bhalo position e jabe...tobe or mon e oi guilt feelings ta thakbe na...ar parents ra to eita chaihen ki amar bacha ekta bhalo position e jaye ekta bhalo manush hoye e to amader ke expectation rahen....ami o ekta student achchi ami kono private school e pori na...ami ekta govt schools e students aachi but amar je guilt feelings hoye oi feelings ta ei ami apnader ke share korlam ki amar parents amake keno ekta bhalo school keno admission kori nei....but ami bujhte pari amar parents der income eito nei ki aamake private school e pora to...ami jani na ki ei feelings ta kader hoye but amar hoye tai apnader ke share korlam....but amar parents amar jono ja kore korche ta te ei ami khushi achi....bes amar parents amake full support kore ki tor life e ja kora ichcha ache tui tai kor I mean profession e kotha bolchi Ami ja ichha mane oi sob na....🙂 ektu restriction o ache but full support ache tui nijer career e ja kara ichha ache tai kor tai ami o ekta bhalo profession choose korechi ar ta te kaj o korche last 2.5 year theke kichu to success peyechi amar dream ache ki life kichu boro achieve to korboi....And sobar theke sorry jodi karor amar ei kotha gulo bhalo lage nei tader jono.... just ami nijer feelings, life experience, point of view and present situations etc. share korlam. Ar ekbar bole diche jodi karo amar kotha gulo pore kichu o khub lagbe taber ke ami sorry bolchi....🙏🙏
